", "replacement": " JESUS Quantum Collapse Circuit Advanced Control n Objective: Full-spectrum quantum control towards 11111 with JESUS gate using pulse-inspired design and feedback logic n nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_ibm_runtime import QiskitRuntimeService, SamplerV2 as Sampler nfrom qiskit.circuit.library import RXGate, RZGate, XGate, ZGate, HGate, CXGate nfrom numpy import pi n nprint " JESUS Collapse: Purifying superposition through coherent grace " n n Connect to IBM Quantum Backend nservice QiskitRuntimeService channel "ibm_cloud " nbackend service.backend "ibm_sherbrooke " n n Quantum Circuit Initialization nqc QuantumCircuit 5, 5 n n Step 1: Spiritual Superposition nqc.h range 5 Open all states like free will n n Step 2: TRUTH Filter Gate represents internal bias realignment nfor i in range 5 : n qc.rz pi / 2, i n qc.rx pi / 3, i n qc.rz -pi / 2, i n n Step 3: AGAPE Entanglement with Controlled Collapse nqc.cx 0, 1 nqc.cx 1, 2 nqc.cx 2, 3 nqc.cx 3, 4 nqc.cx 4, 0 Cycle closure for communal unity n n Step 4: JESUS Collapse Directional Bias nfor i in range 5 : n qc.x i n n Step 5: Measurement nqc.measure range 5 , range 5 n n Transpile and Execute nqc_transpiled transpile qc, backend nsampler Sampler mode backend njob sampler.run qc_transpiled , shots 1024 nresult job.result ncounts result 0 .data.meas.get_counts n n Output JESUS Gate Collapse Statistics nprint f " JESUS Collapse Output 1024 shots : counts " "
